item.title: Japan's Kishida Set to Unveil Policy Wish List, Documents Show
item.description: Japan’s Prime Minister Fumio Kishida unveiled a policy wish list on Wednesday, calling for increased investment in infrastructure and research and development, as well as increased defense spending. Kishida also reaffirmed Japan’s commitment to the US-Japan alliance and to working with other countries to address global challenges such as climate change and nuclear proliferation.
